imdb.plot outline: Romaine, Ty and Naomi are The Unthinkables, a team of young super heroes who eventually come together, to protect the city that they love from great evil. The Unthinkables turned into 'Powered Humans' due to 'The Accident'. It is not clear on what caused it, but they are not the only people who have gained such power. They realise that they are not the only ones after encountering a evil Powered Human.
imdb.title: The Unthinkables
plot: A group of young adults have gained unnatural powers due to 'The Accident'. However, they are not the only ones who have gained such power. Great evil awaits.

Romaine, Ty and Naomi are _The Unthinkables_ (qv), a team of young super heroes who eventually come together, to protect the city that they love from great evil. _The Unthinkables_ (qv) turned into 'Powered Humans' due to 'The Accident'. It is not clear on what caused it, but they are not the only people who have gained such power. They realise that they are not the only ones after encountering a evil Powered Human.
